https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3tHRV61S9NWgme1pOHeXeDRBYvh.jpg Fievel and his friend Tony Toponi find a map that they believe points to a treasure buried somewhere beneath Old New York, and the plucky rodent is determined to find it. However, what he discovers under the city is a tribe of Native American mice who were driven underground by prejudiced European immigrants. An American Tail: The Treasure of Manhattan Island
